(sacred [holy], assassin [assassin], wasteland-survival [wastesurvival])

magic paths [mpath]: F1 H2 U1 R9
item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
With the dilution of the True Blood, the pureblood Abysians feared that the old traditions might be lost to the Humanbred population. To preserve the old ways the slayers were incorporated in the sacred caste of the Anathemants and a Slayer Cult was formed. The Slayers were trained as priests and murder was declared a sacred act. The Slayer Anathemant is a prominent priest-assassin trained in the Temple of the Everburning Pyre.
